metadata.title: NeshamaTech | Where Soul Meets Technology
metadata.description: Relationships that start with the soul. At NeshamaTech, we use advanced technology and personal guidance to uncover true compatibility beyond the profile.

heroSection.typewriterText: In a world where dating suggestions often boil down to a photo and a generic description, we believe in a different path. We've created a personal journey of getting to know you, starting with our unique questionnaire. It allows us to understand you deeply, enabling us to provide match suggestions that are far more than dry details ‚Äì they are a complete story, empowering you to make a decision from a place of true understanding.

challengeCard.title: The Relationship Journey Challenges We All Know
items: Feeling overexposed and like a 'product on a shelf' in apps

solutionCard.title: The NeshamaTech Approach: Technology at the Service of the Heart

constellation.subtitle: To find a true match, we need to truly know you. That's why we developed a unique method that explores five key worlds that make up who you are. This is how we find a complete connection, not a partial one.
constellation.cta_subtitle: Our unique questionnaire is the first step. It's not technical; it's personal. This is your opportunity to tell us your story, so we can find its next chapter.
constellation.cta_button: I want to start my journey

worlds.title: Personality World
worlds.fullDescription: Here we understand who you really are: what motivates you, how you handle challenges, and your communication style. This is the foundation for creating an authentic and complete picture for us and for the other side.
worlds.personalExample: How would you divide 100 'personality points' between traits like empathy, ambition, and a sense of humor?
worlds.insight: A deep understanding of personality allows us to find someone with whom the dynamic will feel natural and right from the first moment.

worlds.title: Values World
worlds.shortDesc: The foundation of a shared home
worlds.fullDescription: What are the pillars of your life? Here we define the values and beliefs that guide you and serve as a compass for building a stable and shared home.
worlds.personalExample: What are your priorities today, and how would you like them to look within a relationship?
worlds.insight: Value alignment is the key to a stable, long-term relationship. This is the most crucial part for accurate filtering and preventing future heartache.

worlds.title: Relationship World
worlds.fullDescription: What is a relationship to you, and what are your expectations from it? Here we'll understand your vision for partnership, from daily communication to shared dreams.
worlds.personalExample: What is your preferred approach to managing joint finances in a relationship?
worlds.insight: When visions for a relationship align, it's easier to start walking the same path together from the beginning.

worlds.title: Partner World
worlds.fullDescription: Who is the person you are looking for? In this world, we will focus the search and understand what traits, background, and values are essential for you in a partner.
worlds.personalExample: What are your absolute 'Deal Breakers' in a partner?
worlds.insight: A precise definition of what you're looking for allows us to conduct an efficient and smart search, saving you from irrelevant suggestions.

worlds.title: Religion & Tradition
worlds.fullDescription: What is your connection to Judaism and how is it expressed in your life? Here we'll detail your identity, your views, and your vision for a Jewish home.
worlds.personalExample: What kind of religious/Torah education would you want to provide for your children?
worlds.insight: Spiritual and religious compatibility is critical in our community. Precise answers here are the key to building a faithful home in Israel on a shared and stable foundation.

promise.subtitle_line1: We understand your journey. That's why we built a process that combines smart technology with warm, human guidance.
promise.subtitle_line2: Our shared goal: to lead you to the exciting moment when you receive a suggestion and immediately understand why it's right for you.

steps.title: Step 1: Personal Discovery Journey
steps.description: This is the heart of our method. Not just a form, but an invitation to a personal journey that reveals what truly matters to you. Your in-depth answers are our compass for finding meaningful matches.

steps.title: Step 2: Building a Winning Profile

steps.title: Step 3: Tech Meets Intuition

steps.title: Step 4: From Reasoned Match to Great Date
steps.description: You'll receive suggestions with a clear reason ‚Äì 'Why we believe this could work'. From there, we guide you through the initial communication, provide support, and listen to your feedback.

faq.subtitle: Transparency is the foundation of trust. We've gathered answers to the most common questions here, so you can start your journey with peace of mind and all the information.

contact_block.subtitle: We're here to help. Our team of matchmakers will be happy to answer any question personally and get to know you better.

questions.question: What is the cost of the service?
questions.answer: As part of our launch period and our desire to build a quality community, the service is currently offered at a symbolic model of $3/month (or free, depending on the period). It's important to emphasize: at this stage, we have no "success fees" at all, even if you get engaged through us. Our goal is to allow you to get to know our unique approach without barriers. In the future, we may switch to a model that includes success fees, but any such change will be subject to updating the terms of use and obtaining your renewed consent.

questions.question: Is the service suitable for all denominations?
questions.answer: Our approach is based on understanding the subtle nuances of the world of values and faith. Currently, our main expertise focuses on the Religious-Zionist community, with an emphasis on academic audiences and quality individuals seeking a serious relationship. We are constantly working to expand our circles of acquaintance and adapt the system for additional audiences in the future.

questions.question: How is my privacy maintained?
questions.answer: Privacy is a supreme value and our absolute commitment. Your profile is visible only to the small team of matchmakers handling your case. Personal details and photos are disclosed to the other party only after we have received your explicit approval for each suggestion. Your information will never be sold or shared with any outside party. You are in complete control of your story.

questions.question: Your questionnaire seems in-depth. Is it really necessary?
questions.answer: Absolutely, and it's your biggest advantage. The questionnaire is not a "form," but a guided "discovery journey" that examines five key worlds in your life. This brief initial investment is what allows us and our technology to truly get to know you, saving you valuable time on irrelevant suggestions, and presenting you with matches based on depth and shared values, not just superficial details.

questions.question: How long does it take to find a match?
questions.answer: This is the most important question, and the honest answer is that there's no timeline for love. But what we can promise is an efficient and focused process. Instead of endless irrelevant dates, you'll receive a small number of high-quality, well-reasoned, and personalized suggestions. Our goal is for your journey to be meaningful, not longer than necessary.
